name: Only O-N-E Director's Cut
description:
Based on the original Game Jam project Only O-N-E for the GMTK Game Jam 2019. 

https://itch.io/jam/gmtk-2019/rate/461804?fbclid=IwAR30LV87ldEi2UJCwzM4X9gW-hUA0frtzDbuXz8LdWdoL7qYVCbNND3215M

Escort the letters safely to the scoring row to earn your one and only point.

Music - Ramble by Peritune https://soundcloud.com/sei_peridot/sets/peritunematerial

Created By Reza Ghassemi and Mark Dizon
